title.en: Dozens killed in Nigeria fuel tanker explosion

excerpt.en: People rushed to collect fuel from the overturned tanker when it suddenly exploded, engulfing them in flames.

title.en: 'We fear for our souls' - Nigerian farmers need armed guards to protect them from jihadists

excerpt.en: Armed guards and special buses are increasingly used to coax terrified farmers back into growing food.

title.en: Passengers jump from windows in fatal Ethiopia train crash
